## Confidence intervals for relative risk

Relative risk

```{r}
a <- 1934
n1 <- 142870
c <- 2894
n2 = 392757

rr <- (a/n1)/(c/n2)

rr
```

Estimated standard error

```{r}
s <- sqrt(1/a - 1/n1 + 1/c - 1/n2)
s
```

Confidence interval

```{r}
alpha <- 0.01
z <- qnorm(1 - alpha/2)

ci <- c(rr * exp(-z * s), rr * exp(z * s))
ci
```

## Confidence intervals for odds ratio

Relative risk

```{r}
a <- 35
b <- 34
c <- 153
d <- 637

or <- (a*d)/(b*c)

or
```

Estimated standard error

```{r}
s <- sqrt(1/a + 1/b + 1/c + 1/d)
s
```

Confidence interval

```{r}
alpha <- 0.05
z <- qnorm(1 - alpha/2)

ci <- c(or * exp(-z * s), or * exp(z * s))
ci
```
